short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract all links on a webpage and export them to a file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkScraper is a powerful browser extension designed to simplify the process of extracting and exporting links from any webpage. With just a single click, you can gather all the links on a page and save them to a text file for easy access and sharing. This tool is perfect for researchers, marketers, developers, and anyone who needs to quickly collect and organize web links.

Key Features:

▪️ One-Click Extraction: Quickly extract all links on a webpage with a single button click.
▪️ Easy Export: Save the extracted links to a text file for convenient access and sharing.
▪️ User-Friendly Interface: A clean and intuitive design makes it easy to use for everyone.
▪️ Blue Color Tone: A professional and visually appealing design with a blue color scheme.

Use Cases:

▪️ Research: Collect all relevant links from research articles and academic papers.
▪️ Marketing: Gather competitor links and analyze their strategies.
▪️ Development: Extract links for testing and debugging purposes.
▪️ Personal Use: Save interesting links for later reading or sharing with friends.

Benefits:

▪️ Time-Saving: Automate the link extraction process to save time and effort.
▪️ Efficient: Organize and manage links more effectively.
▪️ Convenient: Easily share collected links with colleagues or friends.

Effortlessly extract all links from any webpage and export them to a file with just one click.
